alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Greensville; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 2:30PM EDT until October 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 to 32 expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Northampton County. In Virginia, Brunswick, Dinwiddie, Greensville, Eastern Hanover, Western Chesterfield, Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights), Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) and Eastern Henrico Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Brunswick; Dinwiddie; Eastern Chesterfield (Including Col. Heights); Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Greensville; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
